【C】Your other Character at the Center Slot of Front Row gets +500 Power.

【A】When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, place 3 cards from your top Deck into Waiting Room. If there is a Climax among those cards, you may choose 1 opponent's Character with Level 2 or lower at Front Row, place it into Waiting Room.

【A】When your other Character becomes REVERSE, choose 1 of your Character, during this turn, it gets +1000 Power.
【S】CONCENTRATION ［(1) REST this card］ Flip the top 4 cards of your Deck, place them into Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, you draw up to 1 card.

【A】When this card becomes REVERSE, if this card's battle opponent is Level 0 or lower, you may REVERSE that Character.

【A】When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from your top Deck and choose 1 card, place it on top Deck, place the remaining cards into Waiting Room.
【A】At the beginning of opponent's Draw Phase, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is Level 1 or higher, you may return this card to Hand. (Climax is considered Level 0. Return revealed card to its original position)

【C】If you have 2 or more other 《グリザイヤ》 Character, this card gets +1000 Power.

X is equal to the total Level of those cards placed into Waiting Room by this effect. (Climax is considered Level 0)

【C】 If your Waiting Room has 2 or less Climax, this card gets －1 Level in your Hand.
【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, during this turn, this card gets ＋1500 Power.
【A】 This Ability can be activated up to 1 time each turn. During the turn when this card is placed on Stage from Hand, if this card's dealt Damage is cancelled, place the top card of your Deck into Waiting Room, deal Ｘ Damage to opponent. Ｘ is equal to that card's Level ＋1.（Climax is considered Level 0. Damage can be cancelled）

【A】［(1)］ When this card becomes REVERSE, you may pay the cost. If you did, send this card to Memory.
【A】 RECOLLECTION If this card is in Memory, when you or opponent's card is placed from Clock into Waiting Room by own card's effect, that player may place 1 card from his/her Hand into Waiting Room. If not, that player place the top card of his/her Deck into Clock.

【C】RECOLLECTION For each 「餌付け」 in your Memory, this card gets +1000 Power.
